skipInstall.description: Do not add pact packages as dependency to package.json (e.g., --skipInstall).

skipWorkspaceUpdate.description: Do not add update the project workspace (e.g., --skipWorkspaceUpdateskipWorkspaceUpdate).

port.description: The port of the pact server, defaults to 1234.

consumer.description: The name of that consumer, defaults to project name

provider.description: The name of the provider, defaults to `some-provider`

dir.description: The directory of the pact files, defaults to `./pact`

log.description: The directory of the log files, defaults to ``

pactBinaryLocation.description: The directory of the pact binary

pactDoNotTrack.description: In order to get better statistics as to who is using Pact, pact-node has an anonymous tracking event that triggers when Pact installs for the first time
